Posts.EditableText:
There is an annoying bug I Come across pretty often.

I'm using QDK Pro 4.5

Sometimes I often use copy/past in QDK, and 
I Did do my own Investigation into this and
when I Click copy(usually on IF statements)
"copy" puts another bracket { within my ASL
and then I cannot edit that part of the IF
statement and if I try a get a error message and it closes down QDK all together.

upon further Investigation it seems Like if I Click copy but I hit cancel then my ASL is not
changed but If I Click copy then click ok only
then is my ASL changed.

I Saved the bugged ASL just in case you want it.

I Also emailed you already to.

I'm using QDK Pro 4.5

upon further Investigation it seems Like if I Click copy but I hit cancel then my ASL is not
